---
title: URL filter & phrase exclusion 
categories: []
description: " This page explains how to customize the list of sources included in the comparison."
---

The Report Filters tab provides you with the ability to control a list of URLs that are excluded from the content search when generating a report for the folder. To exclude a URL simply click on the ‘exclude source’ button. 

![URL Exclusion](/public/manuals/ithenticate/ithen_url_exclusion.png)

To inlcude a source again you can simply go to ‘Exclusions’ and include sources back. 

![Exclusions](/public/manuals/ithenticate/ithen_exclusions.png)
